entry.source: {F812}Entry Receptionist\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,403001}Hey, kid. Are you a Hunter?{F801}If you're looking to sign up for the{F801}tournament, you're in the right place.{F801}{F802}Winning and losing is the difference{F801}between Heaven and Hell here. You've{F801}got to have guts to enter this!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Entry Receptionist\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,403042}Once you're in the tournament, you're{F801}not allowed to quit. Are you sure you{F801}want to enter?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Entry Receptionist\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,403042}Once you're in the tournament, you're{F801}not allowed to quit. Are you sure you{F801}want to enter?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Entry Receptionist\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,403042}That might be for the best.{F801}Only bloodthirsty, deranged maniacs{F801}enter these things.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Entry Receptionist\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,403042}That might be for the best.{F801}Only bloodthirsty, deranged maniacs{F801}enter these things.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Entry Receptionist\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,403041}Heh, heh... If you say so. You've got{F801}no idea what you're getting into!{F801}This tournament is Hell on Earth.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Entry Receptionist\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,403041}Heh, heh... If you say so. You've got{F801}no idea what you're getting into!{F801}This tournament is Hell on Earth.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Entry Receptionist\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,403012}Then get the hell outta here, kid,{F801}before the crowd gets too crazy.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Entry Receptionist\0{F87A,0}{F813,1,403012}Then get the hell outta here, kid,{F801}before the crowd gets too crazy.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Announcer\0{F813,1,406001}Thank you for your patience,{F801}ladies and gentlemen!{F801}{F802}The tournament testing the true might{F801}of these Hunters is about to begin!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Announcer\0{F813,1,406001}Thank you for your patience,{F801}ladies and gentlemen!{F801}{F802}The tournament testing the true might{F801}of these Hunters is about to begin!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Announcer\0The Ueno Hunter Tournament{F801}Preliminaries shall now commence!{F801}Our first contestants are...{F801}{F802}A new face on the street who's{F801}become the talk of the city!{F801}The self-proclaimed Samurai!{F801}{F802}His name is {F843,0}!{F801}

entry.target: Spare your foe{F801}Finish him{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Announcer\0{F813,1,406002}What's this!? {F843,0} has{F801}spared his opponent's life!{F801}{F802}It looks like the crowd doesn't{F801}appreciate that!{F801}

entry.target: {F812}Announcer\0{F813,1,406003}The stadium echoes with the roar of{F801}the crowd! This is what this Hunter{F801}Tournament is all about!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Announcer\0{F813,1,406002}What's this!? {F843,0} doesn't{F801}give his opponent a second glance{F801}once he's down!{F801}{F802}That's not what the audience came{F801}here to see! Listen to them boo!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Announcer\0{F813,1,406003}He did it! {F843,0} is drenched{F801}in his opponent's blood!{F801}{F802}There wasn't even a moment of{F801}hesitation before the finishing blow!{F801}That's the fearsome Hunter Samurai!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Announcer\0{F813,1,406001}Who could've predicted this?{F801}This newcomer has made it all the{F801}way to the finals!{F801}{F802}Let's begin the final matches!{F801}All Hunters who have made it to the{F801}finals, come on out!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Announcer\0First, let me introduce the man who{F801}surpassed our wildest expectations!{F801}The Hunter Samurai, {F843,0}!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Announcer\0His opponent will be champion of the{F801}Ueno tournament for the last ten{F801}years running!{F801}{F802}The current title holder, the one{F801}and only... Captain Ayame Arei!{F801}

entry.target: {F812}Raging spectator\0You little bitch! I didn't come to{F801}this arena to watch people not get{F801}killed! This is bullshit!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Announcer\0{F813,1,406003}Ladies and gentlemen, I've been doing{F801}this job for years, and I've never{F801}seen anything like this!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Announcer\0We've had a wonderful show here{F801}today! Our winner earns the right{F801}to enter the Tokyo Finals Tournament!{F801}{F802}Go there as Ueno's representative,{F801}and lay your life on the line to{F801}show us all your strength!{F801}{F802}We'll be putting new information on{F801}the finals on the bulletin board, so{F801}be sure to check it out occasionally.{F801}{F802}{F813,1,406004}And now, the Ueno Hunter Tournament...{F801}{F802}...is over!{F801}

You must be{F801}one of those adrenaline junkies.{F801}{F802}Well, just keep doing requests.{F801}If you do enough, I'm sure you'll{F801}make a name for yourself.{F801}
